name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notinote - Get notified for important tasks!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use new tab screen as a note taking tool and get notified for important tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you struggling to keep track of important tasks and reminders? Meet Notinote, your new go-to tool for simple and effective note-taking. With Notinote, you can easily manage your notes and stay on top of your priorities.

Key Features:
📌 Priority-Based Notes: Change the priority of your notes with a single click. High-priority notes are highlighted in red or yellow.

🔔 Periodic Notifications: Get regular Chrome notifications for high-priority notes. The default reminder interval is every hour, but you can customize it in the options.

🔒 Private and Secure: Your memos are stored locally on your device and are never sent to any server, ensuring complete privacy.

✔️ Easy Completion and Restoration: Mark your memos as complete with a right-click. If needed, restore them back with the same action.

Why Choose Notinote?
🧩 User-Friendly Interface: Navigate through your notes effortlessly.

⚙️ Customizable Settings: Adjust the notification frequency to suit your needs.

🚀 Reliable Performance: Enjoy a seamless and bug-free experience.

📈 Productivity Booster: Regular notifications help you remember and complete important tasks.

How It Works:

📝 Add a Note: Simply type your memo and save it.

🔄 Set Priority: Click on the note to change its priority. High-priority notes will trigger periodic notifications.

🖱️ Complete or Restore: Right-click to mark a memo as complete or restore it if needed.

⚙️ Customize Notifications: Go to options to adjust the notification frequency.

Get Started Today!
Download Notinote now and never miss an important task again. Stay organized, prioritize your tasks, and boost your productivity with ease.

Support and Contact:
Have questions or need support? Please leave a comment
